WRITING.TITLE: [meta] Accounts frequently featured here flat out steal from each other
WRITING.TEXT:
http://i.imgur.com/1YOO3CD.png https://i.redd.it/eopj2loddljy.png -These two from Sarcastic Aunty and Sarcastic Bro use exactly the same numbers
http://i.imgur.com/cQo8ez0.png http://i.imgur.com/ftgZACZ.png -These two have the exact same grammatical error and everything
Everyone probably already knows of the post stealing these accounts do, but seeing blatant rips like these makes laughing at them even more enjoyable.
